sections.title: Introduction to Variables
sections.description: Learn what variables are and how to use them.

content.content: Variables are like labeled boxes that help us store information.

quiz.question: What is a variable?
quiz.explanation: Variables hold data values and represent them with a symbolic name.

content.content: Loops help us repeat actions without writing code multiple times.
